typedef for can_get function ptr

Implement TLM1 can_get transaction received from initiator framework

Parameters:
connector_id - unique id of the connector
stream_size - size of data stream
stream - data stream sent to initiator
time_unit - time units
time_value - current time
Returns:
status of operation

typedef for notify_command function pointer

Propagate a user command string to the framework adapter

Parameters:
command - string representation of the command (adapter can execute or ignore it)
output_cb - callback function pointer (optional) - if the command originator wants to get the output
time_unit - time unit
time_value - time value of the current system time
Returns:
Return status
  • 1 : success
  • 0 : error

typedef for notify_runtime_phase function ptr

Notifies framework of time consuming phase.

Parameters:
phase_group - Name of the group the phase belongs in (eg. common, uvm ...)
phase_name - Name of the phase
phase_action - The action for this phase (start, execute, ready to end, ended)
time_unit - Current simulation time unit
time_value - Current simulatin time scaled according to time_unit
participate - Output value to Indicate if the framework is participating in this phase
Returns:
Return status
  • 1 : success
  • 0 : error

typedef int(*) frmw_transmit_phase_type(int target_id, const char *phase_group, const char *phase_name, uvm_ml_phase_action phase_action)

typedef for transmit_phase function ptr

Transmits phase notification to component specified by target_id. Called by backplane to all registered root nodes after phase master calls bp_notify_phase() or by a child proxy to a parent proxy.

Parameters:
target_id - ID of the component to be phased
phase_group - Name of the group the phase belongs in (eg. common, uvm ...)
phase_name - Name of the phase
phase_action - The action for this phase (start, execute, ready to end, ended)
Returns:
Return status
  • 1 : success
  • 0 : error
